short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Tokyo Ghoul Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Tokyo Ghoul background. Tokyo Ghoul wallpaper theme for anime fans.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Tokyo Ghoul Wallpaper amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Tokyo Ghoul.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Tokyo Ghoul mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Tokyo Ghoul HD na pozadí. Motivy pro fanoušky Pusheen.
short.da: Tokyo Ghoul Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Tokyo Ghoul tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Tokyo Ghoul fans.
short.de: Tokyo Ghoul Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit Tokyo Ghoul Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern. Für Tokyo Ghoul Fans.
short.el: Η επέκταση ταπετσαρίας Τόκιο Γκουλ αλλάζει νέα καρτέλα με φόντο HD ταπετσαρίας Τόκιο Γκουλ.
short.es: La extensión Tokyo Ghoul cambia la nueva pestaña con el fondo Tokyo Ghoul wallpaper HD. Para los fanáticos del Tokyo Ghoul.
short.fi: Tokyo Ghoul laajennus muuttaa uuden välilehden sivun Tokyo Ghoul-taustakuvan HD-taustalla. Teemat Tokyo Ghoul faneille.
short.fr: L'extension Tokyo Ghoul change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Tokyo Ghoul. Thèmes pour les fans de Tokyo Ghoul.
short.it: L'estensione Tokyo Ghoul cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Tokyo Ghoul. Temi per i fan di Tokyo Ghoul.
short.ja: 東京喰種トーキョーグールの壁紙拡張機能は、東京喰種トーキョーグールの壁紙HDの背景を持つ新しいタブページを変更します。東京喰種トーキョーグールファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 도쿄 구울 배경 화면 확장은 도쿄 구울 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 도쿄 구울 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Tokyo Ghoul zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Tokyo Ghoul HD. Motywy dla fanów Tokyo Ghoul.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Tokyo Ghoul muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Tokyo Ghoul.
short.sv: Tokyo Ghoul förlängning ändra ny flik med Tokyo Ghoul tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Tokyo Ghoul fans.
short.zh_CN: 东京喰种壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为东京喰种的背景壁纸。东京喰种粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 東京喰種壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為東京喰種的背景壁紙。東京喰種粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
This extension features some of the great Tokyo Ghoul background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Tokyo Ghoul wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Tokyo Ghoul background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search bar using Google.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Tokyo Ghoul new tab.
long.ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_B:
This extension features some of the great Tokyo Ghoul background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.

Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Tokyo Ghoul wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Tokyo Ghoul background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Tokyo Ghoul new tab.
